content.detailedDescription: I witnessed one of the strangest things i have ever seen in the sky on aug.21 at 11:50 pm. i consider myself to be an experienced aircraft spotter having been involved with aviation for close to fifteen years. on the night in question, i was sitting on my back porch, it faces southeast, i sit out there at night sometimes and watch air traffic line up coming from the south with their landing lights fully on, flying north in direction. these are usually flights that are going to be landing into dallas love field, in this instance there was what looked to be two aircraft in line probably about five to six miles in trail, the strange thing about it all, was the aircraft bringing up the rear was closing the distance way faster than it should have been, so i turned my attention to the lead aircraft or what i thought was an aircraft. this was a very unusual light, i couldn���t tell at first but as it got closer i could tell this object was not an aircraft and they were not landing lights, it was the shape of an orb or sphere and orange in color, there is a navigational aid or vor station that aircraft on this route use, its about three miles south of my home. once an aircraft intercepts this station they turn northwest, the object in question seemed to stop in midair in the area of this turn point, it appeared the trailing aircraft had to make an early turn to avoid the object, once the trailing aircraft was parallel with object, the object just disappeared right in front of my eyes. i���ve seen some strange things in skies over the years that i can���t explain, but this one tops them all.
content.summary: Close call for aircraft on approach into dallas!

content.detailedDescription: I was at my mothers house helping her plant some bushes and we set down to take a break. i looked up to see high in the sky right north of town some thing reentering the atmosfear it looked like how the space shuttle looks on reentry only lasting for about 1-2 seconds(i'm not sure if i saw all of the reentry after i saw it it did get brighter but could have already bin reentering?)then it stopped burning or glowing from reentry and was hard to see but it looked light gray and about the size of a bb held out at arms length and it ether slowed down its fall or started flying away from us to the north no con trail. i'm not sure how fast it was going but it looked to me like it was moving slow for an aircraft or not as fast as a jet would. the hole thing only lasted just a few secons and then i lost it and couldn't see it any more this was no meteorite it was under control it looked like to me. as soon as i saw it i told my mom look and she said what is that? i told her maybe space junk or some thing i'm not sure its kind of strange for some thing to slow down after reentry, i'll have to report it to mufon to see if any one ells saw it.
content.summary: Reentry of some thing that slowed down and leveled off

content.detailedDescription: I am shure it was not a plane. a bright light that was not flickering came down from the sky of course in high orbit. moved forward for a second, and backwards for a seconds, then it dissaperared upwards. this happend twice then it was gone. i am preety dog on shure it was not a plane.
content.summary: Bright light came down for a few seconds, then descended upward. this happened twice with the same light

content.detailedDescription:
Night trip to wegman's grocery store in clay-wife needs a special bread they make there, while we live in fulton. going south on 481 from fulton to shopping plaza along 31, near great northern mall. there aren't any airports near by that i know of unless there are private ones. it's mostly cows and trees and houses.

i think it was around the time on the radio 92.1 that they were playing a journey song, which i thought was great and funny because journey is well, journey. anyway.

as passing phoenix exit (14) notice oncoming car with bright headlights up on bridge overhead, but not moving, to the left. as i get closer, i notice lights are far above bridge in the air, looks like one of those towers lit up at night. i think i don't remember a tower nearby, but dismiss it because i'm not the most observant guy. lights are a warm white light, bright and big, like old headlights, not the cold, bluish new headlights, lamps or something on the tower.

it's dark out, but not completely, clear with stars, and a few distinct clouds. i keep driving, and lights are motionless like at the top of a tower, the same kind of height, so trees are blocking it as i drive.

eventually i see another tower on the left, one of those thin towers with little red lights running up it, near what i'm seeing so i have a bit of reference. i can barely make out the tower behind the lights in the darkness, but i can clearly see sky and clouds beneath these lights as i glimpse it through breaks in the trees.

as i finally get about even with the lights, near the other tower, the "headlights" immediately and clearly began moving west, toward me and the highway. it was very low, like i said about the height of a tower, and fairly large. my side of the highway was relatively clear, more traffic in the northbound lane, so i could afford to slow right down to about 40 miles an hour. the thing came right across 481 and over the top of my car. i was not breathing or thinking, just looking at this weird thing. i hunched up over the wheel of the car and was craning my neck like a loony to get a glimpse of this thing but not wreck the car. i kind of wish i pulled over but i didn't want to. 

as it passed low and directly over the car, a few things hit me-how close and big it was-and how it looked like a plane coming in for a landing right over the car into the field on the other side of the road, but it didn't look like a plane at all. the size of the lights and the fact that none of them were blinking were disturbing to me. i've seen planes and helicopters at night my whole life, but this thing gave me a weird feeling in my stomach. most of all the lack of noise-at that closeness there should have been some plane or helicopter sounds i thought. also the fact that it appeared to go from completely motionless to movement right over my car. so i'm thinking i must have been driving for 7 or eight minutes directly into the path of this plane so it looked like it wasn't moving, but none of these things just didn't seem right, especially because the highway does bend a bit.

as it passed over me, i'm looking for blinky lights and see none. three big bright whitish lights at the points (what looked like two headlights from the side) underneath, with a vague black triangle outline against the sky, and a mess of red, non-blinking lights underneath. what i didn't like about this was they were not aligned along a normal plane-like straight line, it was more suggesting it was along the bottom of this triangle shape. it was lighting up the belly very clearly, so i'm thinking "okay, that's where the plane's landing gears and stuff are" because i could see weird details, but they didn't register in my mind because i couldn't make sense out of what i was looking at. 481 is a 4 lane highway, two north and two south lanes. i'm going forty miles an hour, and it took about six seconds to pass over my car and head into the field behind trees on the other side. by this time i'm coming up on the exit onto 31 where great northern mall and wegman's and all those stores are.

i keep glancing to the right and see little glimpses of the lights through the trees and the thing is banking toward the same direction i'm heading in, so i think i'll see it when i get to the intersection. i'm thankful for the red light because i can roll my windows down and try to listen, but all i hear is the car traffic and noise and the whole strip is lit up with all these stores and malls. the thing is still there though, and it's cruising low but across 31 and past. i turn right on 31 toward wegmans and keep peeking because it's hard to concentrate and i don't want to crash the car. i head through another intersection and that's where i see it last, it went from cruising around fast in an arc, now on my left, and i see it in the air through an opening in an intersections, maybe a quarter/half mile further south, where it had stopped moving again.

i felt a little nuts at this point and didn't want to follow it, plus i knew i'd get lost if i went after it in that direction. so i went and got the groceries in a fog. that probably took twenty minutes. on the way home, i went back up north 481 and didn't see anything except i thought it was weird that there were 3 helicopters or planes or something in the area when i came back. they were higher up in the sky, normal blinky aircraft, but circling around in that area. that's all hope this helps, it was one of the weirdest things i've seen. i've only told my sister, wife, and dad, because i know no one will really believe me and i don't want people to make fun of me or think i'm a nutjob or people at work to find out and have a field day with me.
content.summary: Strangely lit object crossing over car slowly, starting and stopping in air

content.detailedDescription:
I was going outside to feed the cats since i couldn't sleep and as i was turning to go back into the house, i noticed in the northern part of the sky a very brilliant light coming from a semi-oval object which seemed to have a somewhat large diameter.  this object was moving extremely fast, when it 1st appeared it started upward and then moved downward and then after about 6 seconds, it disappeared as quickly as it appeared.
the sky is pretty overcast this morning, revealing no stars.
i've seen a comet before, shooting stars (many) and a meteor shower...I'm a student working towards my md/phd and consider myself as someone who thinks "scientifically" but i have to say, that i have never seen anything like this object before and after i came back into the house, i feel quite uneasy.  i'd much rather not have seen it.  i'd be seriously surprised if no one else has seen this object... but then again, how many people are up and outside at exactly 3:04am?
content.summary: Very bright, very fast

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 12:50am cst, i had been in my backyard (a two-acre lot in a small rural subdivision) for about an hour and was facing north-northwest stargazing with binoculars.  i've done this almost every night this month and have seen some remarkable star-like flashes and very bright meteoric-type activity on several occasions, so that's more or less what i expected to see, if anything.

i was sitting down, binoculars in my lap, when i noticed a low-flying, well-lit craft flying north to south emerge from behind the small grove of winged elms on the north side of my property.  it had approximately six orange lights arranged in a loose horizontal cluster, a blue & white rotating beacon on top and an identical rotating beacon on the bottom.  the beacons were not vertically aligned, but i can't remember whether the top or the bottom beacon was on the leading edge, mostly because i quickly found myself rather excited due to the lack of noise, which is pretty much unprecedented considering its close proximity.  still, with that many lights on it - especially the rotating beacons (despite being blue & white instead of the usual flashing red) and because it was on a steady course & pace, i continued to assume it was a plane.

even though i was facing the area from which the craft emerged, it took me by surprise for two reasons:  (1.) the trajectory of the craft was in no way - at least not to my knowledge - a typical flight path, and; (2.) despite its low altitude in relation to the tree line, i did not hear it.  at first, i thought it was a passenger airliner because of the lights & beacons, and i kept expecting to hear engine noise.  i have two ac units, but i do not believe either was cycled on during the sighting.  there is a fairly busy railroad nearby, but i do not believe there was a train running at that time.  after about five seconds of not hearing anything, i became fairly excited and looked through the binoculars, but i couldn't make out any structure or windows despite (or possibly because of) the bright lights.  i stood up and watched it continue on a straight trajectory for about 15 seconds longer - probably five of that fifteen seconds through the binoculars - changing my position to keep a clear view for as long as possible before it disappeared over the tall post oak forest directly behind my house.  i walked up to my back porch (my house is on an east/west slope) to see if i could see the craft emerge to the south, but i didn't see it again.  

i was so mesmerized by the craft, and so preoccupied with trying to figure out what it was, it never entered my mind to use the small digital camera in my pocket.  obviously, i wish i'd have thought to do so.

while i cannot explain why i wouldn't have heard it, i'm certainly willing to concede the craft may have been an airplane headed for denton municipal airport or dfw airport, but considering its low altitude and what i perceived to be its large size, the lack of noise and highly irregular flight path prompted me to report it.  it was not a helicopter.  ambient noise is pretty low out here, and i can't recall a time when i've ever seen any aircraft that low & near, yet been unable to easily associate it with the sound of an engine or engines.
content.summary: Craft w/orange lights & 2 blue beacons flying ne to sw direction.  close.  low.  silent.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i have a new puppy, and if you've had one you know that they have to piss every time they wake up from a slumber. she sleeps in the bed with my wife and i and she was awake and restless around 4-ish. i took her outside on our back porch hoping she would go to the yard. as she started to pee on the concrete, i picked her up and walked out into the yard and sat her down, and patiently awaited numbers 1 and 2 from the little pup. the skies were mostly clear so i took a deep breath the fresh air we have at night lately and was looking up to the south when something like a fast moving bird coming from the east caught the corner of my eye and in a split second as i started to look toward it... the "bird" (which it clearly wasnt)lit up and became a washed out amber (very bright almost white)streak that then became two streaks that were connected at both ends like an oval(open in the middle) then shifted back to a single streak before the lights went dark and the object shot off into the west, and it appeared to be going higher into the sky during this sighting. i was able to see it after the lights blacked out for a split second just as i did when it caught my eye initially. the speed was faster that any jet fighter that i have ever seen (been to many airshows) and left me with some serious goosebumps.
content.summary: Ufo over cumberland, in  lights up, goes dim as it leaves trail

content.detailedDescription: Hi, how are you?  when i was 36 i was going to my sons basketball game in the early afternoon at his elementary school which is a street away from where we lived. i crossed the street and was on the street which is between where we used to live and the school. something made me stop and look up.  in the southern sky i saw a big orb shapped ufo with smaller ones surrounding it, i can't remember if they were scattered around or circular around the bigger one, they were just sitting there watching me.  i stood there looking at it.  i then just walked away.  when i got into the game i looked at the scoreboard and i did not get there until after the second period when i should have been early.  this happened in beacon falss ct 06403 while i was writing this i am listening to john joseph corbett jr and the john corbett band's witchita and a evil alien came on my cd player and told me to stop it. it is 1:50 in the morning. the evil ones also go on my mp3 player.  when they do my good fine alien fathers tell the evil aliens off and they stop.  i have pictures of things, i do not know if they have anything to do with aliens but i do know it has to do with indian.  i am enclosing a few that i already showed people.  i am writing a book called i am just a girl with mental illness but i am good to go.  it is about my experiances through life, including the ten times i was hospitalized for mental illness which i do not have.  i have acute hearing.
content.summary: I saw many orb shapped ones

content.detailedDescription: I was on harwood road headed east (laytonville ca) then i  turned the car  south at the intersection "harwood road and hwy 101" the time was 7:30 pm. i noticed when i was turning a bright light that looked like a shooting star but it was really big and neon green, it seemed to get bigger as it got closer. it then went past over mountains and i could no longer see it. the object seemed to be heading north, it looked like  it would hit the ground somewhere but i could not see it once it went over the mountains.
content.summary: bright neon green  light looked like a shooting star

content.detailedDescription: I saw two identical white lite objects floating over sun valley california around 2:22 pm they stayed the same distance apart and floated at various speeds in a north east direction please contact me 1-818-579-6032
content.summary: I seen 2 hovering objects white glowing in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving a fast food restaurant and had just entered my car when i noticed a bright, white star about 40 degrees above the western horizon. it was just above a bank of clouds that were clearing after a front had come through. the sun was nearly set so the sky was fairly bright. my first impression was that it looked like a brighter version of venus and possibly was a jet. i started my car and turned it so i could have a comfortable look. the object remained stationary and did not vary in brightness for more than half a minute. i then noticed another star-like object about 5 degrees to the left (south) of the other object. it was fainter, but still easily seen. it suddenly began to get brighter. there was some movement (north-south) of perhaps 1/2 degree of the scond object, however both objects were nearly stationary for 3-4 minutes. i was curious if thay were reflecting light, but could not be sure. there was no twinkling. the first object suddenly began to fade as did the second object. both disappeared from view and then bightened again. as i did not have any optical aid i decided to go the couple of miles home and grab my binoculars. after returning home i noticed a jet, but not the unusual objects i saw. my main reaction was of couriosity as to what i was seeing and feel fortunate to have witnessed this. i have been a skywatcher since 1966 and an amateur astronomer since 1971 and feel i know the sky well.
content.summary: The ufos appeared as two pulsating, white, star-like objects that  showed little motion.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my apartment balcony on the third floor watching for meteorites at about 1:30 am when i observed a unusual craft moving too fast to be any commercial airliner. i first thought it was a slow moving meteor. i estimated the speed to be around mach 1, since i have seen many fighter jets, but the object was completely silent and did not emit any sound consistant with commercial or military aircraft. my residence is by a small airport, but the object traversed an area directly over my head to the horizon in about 15-20 sec, which is almost impossible for a civilian aircraft, and a fighter would probably have to be in afterburner. the object had flickering lights underneath that blinked in rapid succession and were blue, red, and white. the object was about 300 feet long and diamond shaped.
content.summary: Fast moving, silent, elongated diamond with rapidly blinking lights underneath

content.detailedDescription: I was with my cousin john outside of our nanny's house at 72 north main street in beacon falls 06403, we had smoked a joint. it was some time during the summer at night. john had to go inside to go to bed to get up for work.  i went to walk away when i was frozen in my tracks and looked up in the sky north of my nanny's house, there was a transparent cloud which glowed from the inside out with a cigar shaped ufo in it which just hovered, i felt as if the whole town stood still.  i do not know how long this lasted but i know i was missing some time.  i sent out a letter to my cousin yesterday to see if he saw it too.  i was not afraid, i just went home, which was three houses north of my nanny's house.  approximatly one year later there was an article with drawings of what i saw in the naugatuck daily news in naugatuck ct 06770 that a man there saw the same thing that i did.
content.summary: I saw a cigar shaped ufo when i was 15 or 16

content.detailedDescription:
I was going to bed just before 12:00 a.M. on monday, 25 august 2008 when i noticed blue and red lights over the dayton international airport out my bedroom window. i assumed a plane and continued to make my bed and get undressed.  when i had done this, taking about 1 minute, i noticed the lights again in the same spot out my window.  a plane would have moved out of sight by this time so i was a little intrigued.  i grabbed my binoculars (bushnell 7-12x30 field at 7x 300ft./1000yds.) and took a look. i have painted a picture with microsoft��� paint��� of what i saw through the window with the binoculars.

i saw a craft situated just east of the airport that had blue, red, and white-yellowish lights at a stationary spot in the sky.  not being a trained observer, i can roughly guess it was at an altitude of around 1000 ft.  i would estimate it's size as roughly 3/4 the length of a boeing 747.  i can only make this estimate based on decades of seeing planes come and go at this airfield.

i watched a couple of minutes through the binoculars and then got right up to my window and looked around the sky with the binoculars to see if i could spot anything else.  i saw an apparently similar craft above the first one by maybe 100-200 ft. between the airport and the first craft.  after a couple of seconds this second craft rose what appeared to be straight up and out of sight.

it was now about 12:10 a.M. i immediately went to my mother's bedroom and opened the door to see if she was still awake.  she was not, so i decided to go outside the house alone.  standing in my front yard i immediately spotted the first craft i had noticed in the same site.  i then scanned the sky with unaided eye and noticed a craft to the northwest of the airport. it had the same light configuration as the other two. i observed these two craft with and without binoculars for about 10 minutes and then went back to my bedroom.

i positioned a chair in my bedroom so i could sit and observe the first craft i had noticed.   i sat and watched it for about 1/2 an hour. this object did make some small changes in altitude and position during the time i observed it.  the lights on it seemed to be steady except that occassionally the white-yellowish ones seemed to blink.

i then decided to go back outside for another look.  the first craft was in approximately the same position but the second one seemed to be moving farther away in the northwestern sky.

i went back in after about 10 minutes and layed down on my bed, getting up about every 10 to 15 minutes to check on the first craft out my window. the craft in the northwestern sky was obstructed from view out this window by trees.

my mom got up at about 2:30 a.M. to use the bathroom.  while i was waiting for her to come out of the bathroom, i looked out my bedroom window and noticed the first craft was now gone.  i scanned the sky with the binoculars and at approximately the same spot where the first craft had been but very much higher in altitude (i really cannot even guess) i saw what looked like a large rectangular object with it's long side faced toward me and tilted forward so i could see it's top.  it was covered in yellowish lights, somewhat like a skyscraper at night with the lights on inside.

i caught my mom on her way back to her bedroom and told her about what i was seeing.  we both went out on the front lawn and neither one of us could locate any unusual lights in the sky.  they were gone.

the sky conditions on this night were what i would call moderately clear.  that is, i could see bright stars and the planets without any difficulty, but the sky was not "filled" with stars like it is on a very clear night.

the png graphic i have supplied shows the lights that were on a single craft.  i could just barely make out some shadowy solid mass the lights were attached to, but could not really discern it's shape.  from the configuration of the lights i guessed that it was probably disk or oval shaped.

i would say the location of the first craft i saw east of the airport would be approximately above the village of ginghamsburg,ohio just next to the airport on the east and the craft in the northwestern sky would be approximately over west milton, ohio.  i would think "night people" (police,etc.) of the town i live in would had to have seen what i saw.  i noticed it while going to bed, but a police officer had to have noticed it on patrol.
content.summary: Multiple craft with lights hovering over dayton international airport

content.detailedDescription: I often use the wwt to cruise the stars and get an idea of locations of certain hubble space telescope pictures that i find interesting. however, the night of the 15th was quite different. you can turn the sky in the wwt. i had moved my position to the far back of my field of view. i was moving in to view a nebula i had seen many times on hubble telescope. however, i saw two blue dots, which should not have been there. upon zooming in on these objects, they were unlike any celestial body i have ever seen. i have been trying my best to get an explanation of them. i zoomed in on great detail to see energy waves being pulled back down into them by gravity. they are like layers of glass, on top of each other. circular, and immense in size. they have markings and what appears like energy fields around one of them. however, the other one looks darker, no energy firlds around it, and the center looks as though it had been quite damaged. almost like the 'energetic ship' is coming to help (you can make your own conclusion). there are either markings or levels. it is obvious the objects are not natural by any means. i have 100 photos of the two objects, i will post as many as i can. if anyone has idea what this is or could be, please contact me.
content.features: Dome,  Patterned Surface,  Appendage(s),  Other,  Unknown
content.shape: Disc,  Egg,  Saturn-like,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Unknown
content.summary: These photos were taken from the microsoft worldwide telescope site.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just finished playing with a band and was heading home
i live in a rural area of bowling green so i was going south on mattock rd.
i was just about to a big curve in the road, when i saw what were like very bright beams of light coming from the south as i came threw the turn i could see the bright light beams
cutting though the dark night. sky, i slow my south  bound travel down to see what it was as it was getting close to me coming from the south in a north, north west track i could see where these bright light were come from it was from an large rectangle object with two rows of 
4 lights the brightest i���ve ever seen. at first i thought  maybe they where helicopters searching for drugs but then quickly said no the lights would be shining downwards and the wouldn���t have been so uniformed this lights look like they were solidly attached 
to something huge like a large rectangle as this object drifted toward me and i was getting closer to it, i could believe what i was seeing i thought of my friend a mufon
member and said i don���t carry what time it is i calling him. i did and woke him up as i talked to him and explained and asked him what the heck this thing is. i creped up to a stop sign on mat lock rd. and hwy 242 where i stopped and just watched as this object floated closer and closer and i was telling my friend what i was seeing i told him i was getting out of here and hung up. but i stayed there at the stop sign to watch it a little longer , i had no camera , i had both widows down on my truck  the there were no sounds it was eerily quite it  moved passed me i bent over and look out the passenger side window at this point i could see only the top and bottom lights on the corner closest to me and the beams cast a light way out in front of it, as i watched it float by i could see the dark outline of something massive behind the light at this point i had a fear come over me and immediately hit the gas and never looked back. i wanted to but just couldn���t do it.
content.summary: Large bright object two rows of 4 lights upper and lower gliding above ground at 3 to 500 feet

content.detailedDescription: Camping at norris campground in yellowstone national park, looked into the sky to view the stars.  partner and i each noticed four separate objects moving very, very quickly (much faster than an airplane).  partner (a skeptic) was first to point out one and said with absolute certainty, "that's a ufo".  i noticed where she was pointing, spotted it, and we both followed it until it disappeared behind trees.  noticed three more after that within the space of approximately four minutes.  went into tent a few minutes later and heard a nearby pack of wolves howling.
content.summary: Greenish-white lights moving very fast in the sky

I had just finished playing with a band and was heading home
i live in a rural area of bowling green so i was going south on matlock rd.
i was just about to a big curve in the road, when i saw what were like very bright beams of light coming from the south as i came thru the turn i could see the bright light beams
cutting though the dark night. sky, i slow my south  bound travel down to see what it was as it was getting close to me coming from the south in a north, north west track i could see where these bright light were come from it was from an large rectangle object with two rows of 
4 lights the brightest i���ve ever seen. at first i thought  maybe they where helicopters searching for drugs but then quickly said no the lights would be shining downwards and the wouldn���t have been so uniformed this lights look like they were solidly attached 
to something huge like a large rectangle as this object drifted toward me and i was getting closer to it, i could believe what i was seeing i thought of my friend a mufon
member and said i don���t carry what time it is i calling him. i did and woke him up as i talked to him and explained and asked him what the heck this thing is. i creped up to a stop sign on matlock rd. and hwy 242 where i stopped and just watched as this object floated closer and closer and i was telling my friend what i was seeing i told him i was getting out of here and hung up. but i stayed there at the stop sign to watch it a little longer , i had no camera , i had both widows down on my truck  the there were no sounds it was eerily quite it  moved passed me i bent over and look out the passenger side window at this point i could see only the top and bottom lights on the corner closest to me and the beams cast a light way out in front of it, as i watched it float by i could see the dark outline of something massive behind the light at this point i had a fear come over me and immediately hit the gas and never looked back. i wanted to but just couldn���t do it.
content.summary: Large brightly lit  object with 2 rows of  lights 4 on top and 4 on bottom slowly moving thought the night sky

content.detailedDescription: Sleeping in bed - felt something pull on chest.  was pulled out window and dropped over 100 miles away by friend's lake cabin.  hovering 20 -30 feet above the lake was a dark rust colored ship a block long.  witness and others were transported onto ship. human-looking technicians communicated telepathically with witness.  after the incident witness was "zapped" back into bed.
content.summary: Large cigar/blimp  shaped ship

content.detailedDescription: Electric, whoring type metallic sound outside bedroom window. sound increased in sound and vibration, never very loud though. very bright white light came in window, got brighter and disappeared along with sound. window does not face any possible light source, from cars, etc.
content.summary: Bright light 5:10 a.M friendswood, tx

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday afternoon august 23rd at approx 130pm i heard noises on my roof so i went out front thinking there were squirrels up there. there were not but while i stood on the sidewalk, i saw a plane flying fairly high up with a contrail streaming out behind it, roughly ne to sw. but what really attracted my attention was a super bright strobing light just below the plane. at first i thought it had come off the plane and was falling. it did move below the aircraft getting lower in the sky but it was not falling. i observed this for over a minute before the light went behind a tree. the plane passed behind the tree much higher up and as it came out the other side, there was another of these bright strobing lights below the plane. i had completely lost sight of the 1st one but was able to follow the second one. the plane continued on course but the 2nd strobing light moved in a westerly direction and appeared to be gaining altitude. at this point i was not sure of what i was seeing. around this time the mailman was delivering to my house. as he walked out to where i was standing, i asked him to tell me if he could see what i was looking out. he did and asked me if i knew what it was. i told him it was the second one light that had appeared below a plane, the first one i lost sight of behind the trees. i told him what i have written above. we stood there watching if for a good 10 minutes and observed it changing  direction now moving sw. while the mailman tracked the object i went into the house and got a pair of binoculars. i rejoined the mailman and observed the object through them. it was very high and very small triangular in shape but very narrow almost like a spear tip. silver to shiny white and strobing light that had no particular pattern. as i looked at it thru the binoculars a another plane passed thru my field of vision below the strobing light. the mailman reluctantly left to continue his rounds after a few more minutes and i remained watching this object for over 30 minutes. i went in to answer the phone after that and when i returned i could no longer locate it in the sky. 
with the naked eye the object was never larger then the head of a pin at arms length but it was much brighter then the brightest star on a summer's night in the country. it did not move as fast as a passenger aircraft at altitude from my vantage point but changed direction at least twice during my observation. from time to time i tried to locate the first one of these that i had observed but had no luck. towards the end of my sighting, the light was not as bright as it was at the beginning while strobing erratically the entire time. i attribute this to the fact the object was climbing and moving further away from me
content.summary: Saw a plane with contrail moving across sky below it a bright strobing light

content.detailedDescription: I was mounting antennas with my father and i saw to a far distance, as night approached, a static light that almost resembled a star. it was too bright and bigger than the usual star size (from what we can see here). the light stood completely static for about 20 min. and when i decided to look again it was completely gone. it had not moved anywhere as we were on a rooftop and we had a clear view of the horizon. it was static and then vanished. i believe this was a sighting (and my first one - that i recall).
content.summary: Static light in sky - disappeared after a short time.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to work on the mass pike.  i always get to exit 9 (eastbound) between the 72 and 75 mile marker, right around 4:00 am, varying 5 minutes either way.  from a several miles away i noticed a big, bright star but i remember thinking it can't be a star, it looks like a plane headlight during landing.  it was bright white without much glow around it.  as i got closer, it never moved from that exact spot.  i slowed down to see this light up close.  i didn't see any aircraft at that point, only the light.  all of a sudden the light disappeared and i was under this aircraft.  i looked up at it (in awe) and was almost at a complete stop (just an idle).  i could see the outline of it as i drove under.  it was triangular, with the top point of the triangle facing south.  it was illuminated with an amber, reddish orange glow.  the metal was a beautiful silver, a slight brushed appearance to it, but the glow/lighting was even across the bottom of this.  the bottom was extremely flat, i seem to recall that there were pieces of metal making up this massive bottom area, not just one big sheet, but i didn't see any bolts or connectors.  i looked to see where the light was coming from and i couldn't see any (obvious)lights around the bottom of it that would make this glow.  it never moved, fluttered, anything. it was perfectly still, no sound at all (i rolled down my window).  it was very low, not more than the height of a cell phone tower/not much above the tree line.

i let my car proceed on just the idle and then i wasn't under it anymore.  i looked in my rearview mirror and my side mirrors and didn't see it once i passed it.

my first thought was that it was a ufo.  the metal underneath it was beautiful, perfect, a beautiful light silver color, the lighting was mesmerizing, there were no wheels, no discoloration, nicks, lumps, etc.  i certainly was never scared.  i told a coworker once i got to work that i had seen a ufo.
content.summary: Saw bright white light from ~2 mi away, never moved, very low, light disappeared and i realized i was under it.

content.detailedDescription: 5-6 starlike lights in a line abrest formation flying from north to south at high speed no sound and seemed to be in the atmosphere, the 5th light fell back a bit then caught up,when the end lights pulled forward. they all seemed very fluid while changing positions. as they flew out of site in the southern sky. at 10:55 3 of the same formation of lights flew back from the south heading north with the lights changing positions in the same fluid manner once again no sound and appeared to be in the atmosphere.
content.summary: 5-6 star like lights in a line abrest formation traveling from north to south

content.detailedDescription:
I took a photo of the sky from my hotel room in copacabana beach in rio de janeiro, brazil. i am simply looking straight up. 
on my final day in brazil i took this piture in the morning, the sky was perfectly blue, hence the reason for my picture. i have finally downloaded my pictures onto my computer and when reviewing them i see this in the picture. 
i did not see this in reality, only in the picture. it is unidentifiable and flying and some sort of object so i think qualifies as a ufo.
content.summary: Unidentified object found in picture from trip
content.locationName: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro

content.detailedDescription:
Hi, i live in orange connecticut, last weekend saturday 8/16/08 at sunset me and 4 friends were at fort trumbull beach right next to silver sands state park in milford ct. , and we saw what we believe to be a ufo.  the first sighting, all 5 of us can confirm what we had seen that night, we didn���������t manage to get any good photos, no one had a digital camera, but we did capture one blurry cell phone picture.  what we had witnessed was a series of orange lights right off the coast of milford ct forming perfectly symmetrical triangles as well as other patterns.  they definitely were not boats or planes or even helicopters with the way they just seemed to slowly drift around each other while pretty much staying in the same place in the sky no more than a few hundred feet up as well as fade away and re appear, even forming into one ball of light and splitting right back up again.  needless to say we were all mildly ���������freaked out���������  but we sat there on a rock pier for about 2 hours mesmerized by these orbs before they began to just fade out and disappear without seeming to travel any farther away. now this past saturday 8/23/08 at about the same time as before me and 2 friends were driving around by the beach in stratford ct right near the lordship airport and sure enough, my friend in the back seat of the car yells to stop the car!  and of course what could it be? the same orbs all over again, only this time we had a digital camera, it belongs to clint depalmer.  so we hurried the camera out of the bag, set it up and took as many pictures as we could before we gave up watching it seeing as how there really wasn���������t much we could do, news organizations im sure paid no attention to our claims.  we used different exposure times and zooms just to capture it from as many angles as possible, one of the pictures being so well zoomed you can see each individual orb seems to form a smaller triangular shape.  and strangely enough a co-worker of mine happened to have seen the same lights this past saturday at walnut beach, another small beach in milford ct. within walking distance of charles island.
so to be honest im not sure what any of us saw but we know it wasn���������t normal.
content.summary: Orange orbs forming triangular shapes moving slowly around the sky, stayed in one place for the most part

content.detailedDescription:
At 9:22 am on friday august 22nd, while at work in bridgeport nj. a co-worker noticed an object in the sky that at times was very bright and at times very dim as if it was rotating, but staying stationary. then as we continued watching this object it would disappear but reappear in a diffrent location, performing the same actions over and over.  at this time i went to get my camera from the car and managed to snap a few pictures.  the object was very high in the sky and was visible for at least 10 minutes or so. after the object disappeared, we went inside knowing what we had seen was not from here, and not explainable.  we blew up the photos the best we could, changing color to make out a shape, finally we found a shape as well as a second object we did not noticed until we blew up the photo.  the main object's shape seemed to be mostly round with bubble like pertrusions on the sides and top, but the bottom had a very dark spot almost like a hole in the bottom of the craft.  below and to the right in the photo near the date in the corner was a second craft and again after blowing it up and changing the color of the background we noticed the shape of this craft was triangular in shape with a dark spot on the top, like a hole.  its almost like they were in sinc with each other.  i would like if anyone could professionally blow these up with better equipment to help see the objects more clearly.  i still have the photos on the memory stick in the camera i took them with.  after reflecting on what occured, i do beleive without a doubt that we had witnessed a ufo. i have always been a believer and would love to have these photos professionally examined and enlarged, to make others be able to see what we saw.
thanks
c.W.
content.summary: Noticed a very bright object in the sky, kept disappearing and reappearing in a diffrent location

content.detailedDescription:
It was my junior year of highschool & i was training for the upcoming soccer season and was doing alot of running in the early to mid-evening when the sun was down and it would be cooler. i was running between 5 - 10 miles daily. as a serious athlete ( i won the presidents physical fitness award all 4 years of highschool ) i was always completely free of drugs and alcohol , and was lucid at all times. as i was running north on route 3 and nearly at the intersection where rt.3 and rt. 112 joined... directly across the street from what used to be the old mountaup motel and cabins. i looked over my right shoulder in the direction of the old 
iga foodliner & the east branch of the pemigewasset river as i saw a cigar shaped craft that was glowing fiery red and was ascending nearly straight up , but not quite. but it was ascending very slowly , silently and at a very sharp angle. i stopped dead in my tracks and began staring at the object absolutely stunned & scared while also overcome by curiosity having never seen anything like this before. i stared at the object as it was silently ascending for about 20 - 30 seconds. the oddest part of the experience was that i was overwhelmed by the feeling that not only could i see the craft , but that it also could see me & knew i was watching ! it was quite eerie. i noticed that in the line the object was traveling that soon my view was going to be blocked by a big maple tree that was across the street from where i was standing. the tree was quite large & was in full bloom with all it leaves as fall was approaching. sure enough the craft disappreared from my view when it crossed behind the maple tree and indeed my view was completely obscured. i gauged where the craft would reappear and focuded my attention to that area of the sky & to my astonishment it never reappeared. it just vanished ! i just stood there in unbelief. i knew what i saw was real & not some figment of my imagination.  but i also knew that this craft could not possibly be of this earth. at least not to my knowledge. i want to repeat that the eeriest part of this experience was that i felt like not only could i see them , but they could also see me. i basically sprinted the last mile of the run to my home very , very scared. once home i deliberated on what i had seen but didn't tell anyone for fear of being ridiculed. in the last 30 some odd years i have only shared this story with only a handful of people. i'm convinced now that ufo's are real & that this is indeed what i saw. i'm prepared now to take my stand with others who've had similar expierences and share with others what i believe to be a real phenomenon.
content.summary: Cigar shaped. glowing fiery red

content.detailedDescription: As my fiance' and i were sitting outside yesterday, i looked up and noticed the moon was out and right as i was looking at it, a small star-like object was moving right under the visible part of the moon (which from my view was the top half). i didn't know what it was, my fiance' thought it was a satellite, but i did not think they could move like that. it looked like it was coming in a north to south direction and right when it got to one side of the moon, it looked like it blinked on and off a few times and then disappeared. then about 2 minutes later it was up near the top left side of the moon, then blinked on and off again. by the next time it had appeared, it had dropped way down below the moon, but still on the left hand side, then it blinked on and off a few more times, then it was gone again. about five minutes later it reappeared and was north in the sky again (to the right hand side of the moon)the way it came from. it was still blinking from time to time. the other strange thing was that a few military planes were flying in a formation overhead, but they weren't flying too fast, so maybe it was just a coincidence? a few nights ago i saw some strange blinking at night. i would like to know if anyone else has been seeing this? it was very cool, i wish it would have been closer so i could have seen it better. it was exciting to see it disappear and then reappear pretty far away.
content.summary: Object blinking by crescent moon in daytime.

content.detailedDescription: I have had a few sightings in my life but this event was what seemed to be a nightmare about witnessing several craft making themselves known to myslef and some friends...It was very real and i recall being chased by some type of humanoid creature. i awoke but experienced a choking sensation and extreme naseau followed by dizziness and heavy perspiring and disorientation. this has never happened to me before and i was wondering if these symptoms had occurred to others after 'dreaming' of aliens and crafts. the object that stands out most in my mind was one craft shaped like a black triangle with a shiny silver diamond shape on one surface.
content.summary: Extremely ill immediately after awakening from very disturbing dream
